TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CacheRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定在取得 時由使用者介面自動化架構快取的屬性和模式。

span.span: Specifies properties and patterns that the UI Automation framework caches when an is obtained.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擷取屬性和模式透過[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]需要慢效能的跨處理序呼叫。Retrieving properties and patterns through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] requires cross-process calls that can slow down performance. 您可以透過快取屬性和模式，在批次作業中的值，來增強應用程式的效能。By caching values of proprieties and patterns in a batch operation, you can enhance the performance of your application. 藉由呼叫類別建構函式，建立新的快取要求。Create a new cache request by calling the class constructor. 填入要求的方式是重複呼叫方法。The request is populated by repeated calls to the method. 只有一個作用中。Only a single can be active. 有兩種方式可以啟動要求：There are two ways to activate a request: - 呼叫在要求上。Call on the request. 這將推送到堆疊，要求和彈出要求，當物件已處置。This pushes the request onto the stack, and the request is popped when the object is disposed. 若要確保處置，即使例外狀況，使用 從傳回的值內`using`區塊 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中)。To ensure disposal even if an exception is raised, use the return value from within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic). - 要求放入內部堆疊，藉由呼叫。Put the request onto the internal stack by calling . 只有在堆疊上最上層的要求為作用中，而且它必須是從堆疊移除的下一個。Only the topmost request on the stack is active, and it must be the next one removed from the stack by . 取出要求會停用它。Popping the request deactivates it. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 取得當要求為作用中的項目將已快取屬性和指定的模式值。 elements obtained while the request is active will have cached values for the properties and patterns specified. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用快取模式和屬性。The following example shows how to use to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#107)] 下列範例示範如何使用和快取模式和屬性。The following example shows how to use and to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當建立時，識別項作為預設屬性加入至快取。When a is created, the identifier is added as a default property to cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IDisposable Activate() cil managed

summary.span: 對於在相同執行緒上要求 時所傳回的項目，將此 設定為項目的現用規格。

span.span: Sets this as the active specification for the items that are returned when an is requested on the same thread.

returns.span: 可用來處置 的物件。

span.span: The object that can be used to dispose the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法通常最好使用是和做為啟動。Using this method is usually preferable to using and as a means of activating the . 物件會推送到堆疊時呼叫，並接著推出時加以處置。The object is pushed onto the stack when is called, and then popped off when it is disposed. 若要確保處置，加上傳回的值內`using`區塊 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中)。To ensure disposal, place the return value within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用快取模式和屬性。The following example shows how to use to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#107)]

summary.span: 將屬性或模式識別項加入至 。

span.span: Adds a property or pattern identifier to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當建立物件後，識別項作為預設屬性加入至快取。When a object is created, the identifier is added as a default property to cache. 將物件與已經在快取要求中沒有任何作用。Adding an object that is already in the cache request has no effect.

summary.span: 取得或設定一個值，以指定傳回的項目是否應該包含對基礎[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 的完整參考，或只需要包含快取的資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether returned elements should contain full references to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], or only cached information.

value.span: 如果傳回的項目包含對基礎[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 的完整參考，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是預設值，並指定傳回項目包含基礎的完整參考[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。 is the default value, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 指定傳回項目沒有參考至基礎[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，而且包含僅快取的資訊。 specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], and contain only cached information. 項目，包括上的特定作業， ，和，需要完整的參考; 嘗試對這些項目，並沒有任何會導致。Certain operations on elements, including , , and , require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an . 使用會比較有效率時需要只有屬性，因為它可避免額外負荷涉及設定完整的參考。Using can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references. ## Examples 在下列範例中，設、 與結果，僅快取屬性和模式可供擷取的物件。In the following example, is set to , with the result that only cached properties and patterns are available for the retrieved object. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pop() cil managed

summary.span: 從目前執行緒的內部堆疊中移除使用中 。

span.span: Removes the active from the internal stack for the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 移除目前作用中的要求方法。Only the currently active request can be removed using the method. 嘗試移除是不目前一個導致例外狀況的要求。Attempting to remove a request that is not the current one results in an exception. 除非您巢狀結構快取要求，會偏好使用放置在堆疊上的要求。Unless you are nesting cache requests, it is preferable to use to place the request on the stack. 原因是，您可以使用內`using`區塊 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中)，確保即使發生例外狀況，從堆疊取出要求。The reason is that you can use within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic), ensuring that the request is popped off the stack even if an exception is raised. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何停用使用。The following example shows how to deactivate a by using . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

exception.span: 嘗試移除並非最後一個推入堆疊的快取要求。

span.span: An attempt was made to remove a cache request that was not the last one pushed onto the stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Push() cil managed

summary.span: 將 放入內部狀態堆疊，成為目前執行緒的使用中要求。

span.span: Places the on the internal state stack, making it the active request on the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多個物件可以放到狀態堆疊。Multiple objects can be placed onto the state stack. 必須從發送; 的順序中的堆疊中移除快取要求否則，引發例外狀況。Cache requests must be removed from the stack in the order they were pushed on; otherwise, an exception is raised. 除非您巢狀結構快取要求，會偏好使用放置在堆疊上的要求。Unless you are nesting cache requests, it is preferable to use to place the request on the stack. 原因是，您可以使用內`using`區塊 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中)，確保即使發生例外狀況，從堆疊取出要求。The reason is that you can use within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic), ensuring that the request is popped off the stack even if an exception is raised. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何啟動使用。The following example shows how to activate a by using . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Automation::Condition ^ TreeFilter { System::Windows::Automation::Condition ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Automation::Condition ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定一個值，以指定在快取時使用的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目樹狀目錄的檢視。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree to use when caching.
The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.
The default view is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關檢視[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目樹狀目錄中，請參閱[UI 自動化樹狀目錄概觀](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-tree-overview.md)。For additional information on views of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree, see [UI Automation Tree Overview](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-tree-overview.md). ## Examples 在下列範例中，設使快取是為所有的項目，不論是內容的檢視或控制項檢視的一部分。In the following example, is set to so that caching is done for all elements, regardless of whether they are part of the content view or the control view. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Automation::TreeScope TreeScope { System::Windows::Automation::TreeScope get(); void set(System::Windows::Automation::TreeScope value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定一個值，以指定是否只快取樹狀子目錄的根項目，或也要快取子系或子代。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether caching is done only for the root of the subtree, or also for its children or descendants.

value.span: 、、 或 其中一個或多個。

span.span: One or more of , , , or .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的範圍相對於或多個物件正在擷取，不是依據其上的物件或呼叫。The scope of caching is in relation to the object or objects being fetched, not in relation to the object on which or is called. 請參閱範例。See the example. ## Examples 在下列範例中，清單方塊項目取自父視窗項目時為作用中和是。In the following example, a list box element is obtained from the parent window element while a is active and is . 指定之屬性的子項目 （也就是清單項目） 會儲存在快取，而且可以從擷取清單方塊。The specified properties of the child elements (that is, the list items) are stored in the cache and can be retrieved from the of the list box. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#119](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#119)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#119](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#119)]

exception.span: 嘗試將屬性設定為 或 。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property to or .
